detail_desc: Jacket in imitation suede with imitation leather details, a collar with tabs and metal buckles, a zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners. The polyamide content of the bra is partly recycled.
Short skirt in twill made from a viscose blend with a high waist and detachable tie belt. Pleats, a concealed zip in the side seam and a gathered seam at the hem with a flounce.
Leg warmers in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with roll edges.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Long, 5-pocket denim shorts with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and slim legs.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a high waist, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with short, wide sleeves, a gathered yoke, buttons at the back and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Ribbed leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.

Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with covered elastication, a button and concealed drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a zip fly, and back and leg pockets with a button. Loose fit with tapered legs and covered elastication at the hems.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Shirt dress in a viscose weave with a narrow collar, button placket, gathered seam at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.
Beach dress in sturdy, printed jersey with deep armholes and short sleeves. Draping over the sleeves and down the sides, gathered elastication at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Bag in braided paper straw with two handles, a magnetic fastener at the top and two inner compartments. Lined. Size approx. 12x23x40 cm.
Wide, 5-pocket trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and a jersey lining. Designed for indoor use only.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in soft, fine-knit wool with a roll-edge hem.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Top in patterned cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, slub cotton jersey with an appliqué on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, double, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Sports top in fast-drying, functional fabric with a small V-neck at the front with decorative straps and short cap sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline, short cap sleeves and a drawstring at one side of the hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Flared skirt in jersey with an elasticated waist, overlocked frill trim at the top and overlocked hem. Unlined.
Legs in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Pyjama bottoms in a gently draping, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide legs with decorative turn-ups at the hems.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip in the side. Unlined.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in waffled cotton jersey. Bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and button fly.
High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with an opening and lacing at the sides.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a fine-knit silk and organic cotton blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Saddle bag in imitation leather with a braided imitation straw finish. Imitation leather flap with decorative tabs and a metal ring at the front, a magnetic fastener, a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Depth 5.5 cm. Height 13.5 cm. Width 19.5 cm.
Trousers in a lightweight Tencel™ lyocell weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs. Wide cotton jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
Supersoft, low-rise jeggings in softly draping, ultra-light denim that moulds to the body for a feather-light feel. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and a zip fly and button.
Straight-cut jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front, patch front pockets and dropped shoulders. Lined.
Cardboard gift pack with a silk ribbon hanger at the top containing a pair of socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with glittery threads and elasticated tops.
Short skirt in a crinkled, patterned weave with a concealed zip and button at one side, a seam at the top and gentle flare to the hem. Lined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck at the front, cups with removable inserts and ties that fasten at the back of the neck.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs.
Jumper in a light, fine, soft knit with long sleeves, raw edges and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in sequin-embroidered jersey with a lined hood, zip down the front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Studio Collection. Calf-length coat in a sturdy wool and polyester weave with large notch lapels and buttons down the front. Defined, dropped shoulders with a large shoulder tab and button, and belt loops with a tie belt at the waist. Wide welt front pockets, a jetted inner pocket and a high-cut back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Long coat in jacquard-weave viscose with narrow notch lapels, covered buttons at the front and flap welt pockets. High slits in the sides and tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and raw-edge hems.
Fitted, calf-length dress in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. High collar, long ties at the waist, a wrapover and open section at the back, and slits in the sides. Lined.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Shoulder bag in woven fabric with a sheen. Adjustable shoulder strap and a zip at the top and two zipped outer compartments. Lined. Size approx. 4x15x21 cm.
Sports shorts in crisp, fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with wide, covered elastication and an elastic drawstring, and side pockets.
Dogtooth-patterned scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. The scarf is made from recycled polyester.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, decorative lacing at the front, a zip on one side and a loop at the back. Soft fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Shorts in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Regular waist that is elasticated at the back, pleats at the front, side pockets and wide legs.
Bomber jacket in printed satin with a ribbed stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a wide neckline, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front and smocking at the top. Covered buttons down the front, long sleeves, narrow cuffs with a covered button, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved, short lace dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck, concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Fully lined, padded bikini top with gathers at the front, overlocked frill trims and side support. Ties at the back and detachable straps that tie at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a text print on the front, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and diagonal side seams with a slit at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Detachable tie belt at the waist.
Sleeveless top in a soft viscose weave containing some linen with a V-neck front and back, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and broderie anglaise at the top.
Dressing gown in soft, patterned fleece with a hood, side pockets and tie belt at the waist.
T-shirt in soft linen jersey with a round neckline and gently rounded hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in textured chiffon with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.

Shirt jacket in a soft weave containing some wool with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester and wool content of the shirt jacket is recycled.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with embroidery at the front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Watch in stainless steel with an adjustable leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 2 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch 3.6 cm.
Short dressing gown in cool satin with lace sections. Wrapover front with concealed ties at one side, a sewn-in tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length, scallop-trimmed sleeves.

Suit trousers in a wool-blend, marled flannel with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Zip fly, creases, side pockets and flap back pockets with a button. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short-sleeved top in a soft, fine knit with buttons on one shoulder and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
